meanings.sent1: Her unimpassioned demeanor made it hard to know what she was thinking.
meanings.sent2: The unimpassioned delivery of the speech left the audience feeling indifferent.
meanings.sent3: Even the most exciting news was met with an unimpassioned response from the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His unimpassioned face was like a mask, revealing nothing of his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The unimpassioned tone of her voice made it clear she was not emotionally invested.

meanings.sent1: The unimpassioned decision was made based on logic rather than sentiment.
meanings.sent2: His unimpassioned response to the tragedy surprised everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: Even in the face of danger, he remained unimpassioned and focused on the task at hand.
meanings.sent4: Her unimpassioned reaction to the news was a stark contrast to the hysteria around her.
meanings.sent5: The unimpassioned way he handled the situation showed his strength of character.

meanings.sent1: The unimpassioned performance failed to captivate the audience.
meanings.sent2: His unimpassioned attitude towards his job was evident in his lackluster performance.
